thread.title: Peeks Social Hires VP Of Content Management

author: cnbc.com
title: Peeks Social Hires VP Of Content Management
text:
TORONTO, May 09, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Peeks Social Ltd. (TSXV:PEEK) (OTCQB:PKSLF) (“Peeks Social” or “the Company”) is pleased to announce the addition of Brian “Beej” Gefsky to the Peeks Social team as Vice President of Content Management.
Beej is an experienced content strategist based in Los Angeles, CA. His ability to acquire, distribute, produce and monetize content has been proven since his first foray in entertainment at the William Morris Endeavor Talent Agency. Since then, Beej has helped multiple companies increase their revenue, audience and content libraries. Over the past 20 years Beej has worked with Original Films, G4 TV Network, Ripe Digital Entertainment, NASCAR, Blue Wave Media, Mojo Makers, WHAM Video Game Network and SimulTV. Beej brings his extensive experience in content creation, production and development skills for live talk shows, animated half hour sitcoms and branded entertainment to Peeks Social.
“The Peeks Social platform represents the next generation of content monetization platforms, enabling streamers and content creators to generate new revenue streams from new and pre-existing content. The ability for viewers to then be able to instantly interact and transact with these content creators represents a paradigm shift that I am thrilled to be a part of,” states Beej Gefsky.
“We’re excited to have Beej join the Peeks Social team. In addition to the extensive content management experience Beej brings to the table, Beej will be heading up our Los Angeles based United States operations to manage and develop innovative opportunities for Peeks Social influencers to maximize their global audiences on the Peeks Social platform,” continues Mark Itwaru, Chairman and CEO of Peeks Social.
The Peeks Social app can be downloaded in either the Apple or Google app stores, or by visiting www.peeks.social.
